summary: Aesthetic changes to some of the Skyrim followers, using the NPC Editor
descriptionHtml:
-------------------------------------------------------------------
FC Followers v1.1
===================================================================
                                          - a Flatline Construct -
-------------------------------------------------------------------


I used Skyrim NPC Editor by foretrenty for the changes:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=4554

I\'ve also used Coverwomen Look #4 by mrLenski to get the screen
caps: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=3563

All other textures and all meshes are default.


===================================================================
WHAT DO THESE MODS DO?
===================================================================

Using foretrenty\'s NPC Editor I\'ve made changes to some of the
default followers.

- Face and hair changes.
- Potential marriage option added.
- Equipment changes.

I thought I\'d share ...


===================================================================
FOLLOWERS IN VERSION 1.1
===================================================================

Illia (Imperial, Darklight Tower)
Jenassa (Dark Elf, The Drunken Huntsman)
Uthgerd the Unbroken (Nord, The Bannnered Mare)
Eola (Breton, Hall of the Dead)
Brelyna Maryon (Dark Elf, The College of Winterhold)
Aela the Huntress (Nord, Jorrvaskr)


===================================================================
HOW TO INSTALL
===================================================================

Open the FC Followers ZIP file.

Each follower has their own ESP and BSA file. Choose the one you
want to change and copy both files into your Skyrim data folder.

Make sure the new mod is selected when starting your game.


===================================================================
HOW TO REMOVE A MOD
===================================================================

Just delete the follower\'s ESP and BSA files from your Skyrim data
folder.


===================================================================
FIXES
===================================================================

It is possible for there to be a small gap between the follower\'s
neck and body. This is caused by a weight change in the mod.

To fix this you need to set the NPC weight in game to match:

1. Open console
2. Click on follower
3. setnpcweight xx

Replace xx with the new follower weight below:

Illia: 20
Jenassa: 20
Uthgerd the Unbroken: 40
Eola: 30
Brelyna Maryon: 10
Aela the Huntress: 20


===================================================================
BUGS
===================================================================

A known bug with Illia resets her relationship rank and makes it
impossible to recruit her again after you\'ve dismissed her. It will
also prevent the marriage option from triggering.

You can temporarily fix this with the console when you need to
rehire or propose:

1. Open console
2. Click on Illia
3. setrelationshiprank player 4

If anyone has a better solution please tell me.


===================================================================
CREDITS
===================================================================

An excellent NPC Editor thanks to foretrenty.
Images possible thanks to the Coverwoman mod by mrLenski.

All the major and minor changes by flatline42.
